list: Perfect for use at work, at home, or in transit
Made with high quality food grade stainless steel interior and exterior
Dual wall vacuum insulation that keep drinks hotter longer
Silicone base that provides a skid proof bottom to prevent sliding

reviews.title: "First Stainless Tumbler"
reviews.text: I have 2 other bubba cups that I absolutely love and they perform exactly how they say. I purchased two of these based off the previous history with my others. This is my first stainless one however, I would give 5 stars but under the description for this cup, it states that it has a silicon base so it doesn't slide around. This is false, the bottom of the cup is straight stainless on both of the ones that I purchased.
reviews.author: hubbatron

reviews.title: "Travel mug/water bottle"
reviews.text: This looks a lot like the Bubba travel mug which I recommend 100% - i take it to work, drop off kids, walk dog and coffee is still hot inside a few hours later!  it's simple and it works!
reviews.author: Emma

reviews.title: "Needs one thing"
reviews.text: If it came with spare o-rings it would get a 5. The ring on the lid will wear out with use.
reviews.author: art

reviews.title: "Great Cup"
reviews.text: Got these for my kids and they love them. Work well and much less expensive than other brands.
reviews.author: GJ

reviews.title: "Water bottle"
reviews.text: It is a great product except I could buy 3  for $15 at Sam's Club rather than the $10 I paid on Black Friday at Lowes
reviews.author: Ron

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Monica

reviews.title: "It keeps drinks cool for hours, even in a hot car."
reviews.text: This product is every bit as good as higher priced bottles for a fraction of what they cost.i like the place that allows a straw too. Also, it is the right size to fit in my truck drink holder
reviews.author: DaveS

reviews.title: "Versatile Beverage Container"
reviews.text: Great find! Works great at keeping drinks hot or cold. I use it for tea - it's perfect.
reviews.author: Velociraptor
